channel.title: Collaborative on Dr. Juan Carlos Galán Hernández
channel.description: Recent content in Collaborative on Dr. Juan Carlos Galán Hernández

item.title: Reflecting on Collaboration (WJ #4)
item.description: Collaborative working is present in all aspects of our life. From school work to our jobs to our home. Learning to work with others is a fundamental skill in our society. Collaborate with others on a project may allow to achieve better results and be more productive than working individually. Some benefits from collaboration are: Sinergy, Community Awareness, Share resources, Overcome of Obstacles, Avoid Duplication, Access to funding sources (“Benefits of Collaboration” 1).
